sword.name: Ancient Blade
sword.description: At the altar you can glimt something slotted in. At further examination you notice it looks like a legendary blade, humming with an ancient power.

effects.message:
With a deep breath, you raise the Ancient Blade. As you charge, the blade ignites in radiant light. The Dragon roars, lunging toward you—but with a single, precise strike, you plunge the sword deep into its heart. A deafening cry fills the chamber before silence falls…, You have slain the Dragon.
 Congratulations you won the game!

key.name: Skeleton Key
key.description: A skeletal key, cold to the touch.

take.message: You retrieve the key from the fallen warrior’s grasp.

wooden_sword.name: Wooden Sword
wooden_sword.description: A frail training sword, unlikely to hold up in real battle.

effects.message:
You try to spank the dragon with the Wooden Sword and the dragon just seems to enjoy it and with a sneeze his fire consumes you. 
The fire tears you apart to a very slow DEATH. 
Better luck next time!

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: A monstrous being of flame and shadow, watching you with molten eyes.

take.message: You cannot take the Dragon. It is far beyond your grasp.

skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.description: A lifeless adventurer, still clutching a key in its grip.

open.message: You pry the key from the skeleton’s grasp and add it to your inventory.

chest.name: Treasure Chest
chest.description: An ornate wooden chest sits in the corner, its lock rusted away.

open.message: Inside, you find a Wooden Sword. It’s not much, but better than nothing. You add it to your inventory.

instructions:
Navigate through rooms, collect items, and defeat the dragon!
Use commands like 'walk', 'take', 'use', and 'open', 'go_back', 'look_around' to interact.
Type 'inventory' or 'inv' to see what you're carrying.
Good luck, adventurer!
credits:
Game created by: Andréas Awenlöf
Inspired by classic text adventures
Thanks for playing!

room8.description: An enormous iron door looms ahead, the keyhole shaped like a skull.

exits.name: Mysterious Corridor
exits.description: A long, eerie corridor filled with echoes from the past.

exits.name: Boss Door
exits.description: A massive, skull-adorned iron door that radiates an ominous presence.
exits.locked_description: You grip the handle, but it doesn’t budge. The door stands firm, sealed by an unseen force. Your eyes trail to the intricate, skeleton-shaped keyhole—an invitation, a challenge. Something must fit... but what?

key.open_description: The key clicks into place, turning with a slow, agonizing grind of ancient mechanisms. The door creaks open, revealing a darkness that feels almost… alive.

room9.name: Dragon’s Lair
room9.description: A vast cavern filled with gold and bones. The Dragon sleeps in the center, its massive form blocking your only way out.

exits.name: Boss Door Room
exits.description: The way back to the iron doors, now feeling much smaller in comparison to the lair.
